law.text:
Any person subject to this code shall be punished as a court-martial may direct who, for the purpose of avoiding work, duty or service:
Feigns illness, physical disablement, mental lapse, or derangement; or
Intentionally inflicts self-injury.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 119, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 88.
